Topic: Illustrate plants with and without water.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw a plant that looks healthy and green when it has water.
The student can draw a plant that looks wilted or dry when it does not have water.
The student can draw a plant that grows well in sunlight.
The student can show a plant that does not grow well in a dark place.
The student can represent that plants need water and light to live and grow.
